          <title>
            <string language="en">Monomer from which the poly(propene) is made</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monomere, von der das poly(propene) gebildet 
wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Monomère à partir dont le poly(propene) est fait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Monomer de que o poly(propene) é feito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Monomero da cui il poly(propene) è fatto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονομερές από το οποίο ο πολυ (propene) γίνεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Monomer de el cual se hace el poly(propene)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the displayed formula of a monomer, called propene, from which the poly(propene) is made.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">displayed formula</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">monomer</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die angezeigte Formel einer
Monomere, genannt Propen, von dem das poly(propene) gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formule affichée d'un
monomère, appelée le propène, dont à partir le poly(propene) est 
fait.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a fórmula indicada de 
um monomer, chamada o propene, de que o poly(propene) é feito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formula 
visualizzata di un monomero, chiamata propene, da cui il poly(propene)
è fatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει επιδειχθέντα τύπο ενός 
μονομερούς, αποκαλούμενο propene, από το οποίο ο πολυ 
(propene) γίνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el fórmula visualizado 
de un monomer, llamado el propano, de el cual se hace el 
poly(propene).</string>
          </description>
